overview: It’s a fact: there’s no quicker way to make a boy a man than to fill him with man-dick, lots of it, big, raw and meaty. Out in the wilderness, far from the normal routine, a guy can really let his inner animal out. And when he’s lucky—on a camping trip with his best buddies, say—he’ll find another inner animal to get down and dirty with. Bareback Boot Camp is where horny young studs-in-the-making take their hungry asses and big, dripping uncut dicks so they can drill each other in the finer points of manhood. And when they’re done, the guys return home a little older and loads wiser. Now you too can join ten hot and horny young men at the camp of your wettest dreams. You’re never too old to go to camp, and it’s guaranteed: you will come back sexually satiated as well.
title: Raw Man #2: Bareback Boot Camp
